entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 51 %
Dewpoint: -8.5°C
Wind: WSW 16 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming east 20 overnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain showers or flurries near noon and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5 except minus 8 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5 except minus 8 in low lying inland areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
